document.full_text: exiled syrian opposition activists will meet in turkey next week to support the uprising in their homeland and help coordinate the campaign to end almost five decades of baathist rule, organizers said on thursday.
document.title: syrian opposition in exile plans to meet in turkey
lines_and_colors: exiled syrian opposition activists will meet in turkey next week to support the uprising in their homeland and help coordinate the campaign to end almost five decades of baathist rule, organizers said on thursday.
